arts.ttl: Thomas Frank hails Southampton win as one of his 'biggest' Brentford moments
arts.sum: Bees record first away win in the Premier League this season in emphatic fashion
Southampton manager Ivan Juric says his side's performance in the second half of their 5-0 Premier League loss to Brentford was "a disaster".

arts.ttl: An extremely bad day – Ivan Juric apologises after Saints thrashed by Brentford
arts.sum: Brentford ran out 5-0 winners at St Mary’s.

arts.ttl: Mbeumo at the double as five-star Brentford thrash sorry Southampton
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo scored twice as Brentford thumped sorry Southampton for their first Premier League away win of the season. The Cameroon forward, linked with a potential January move to Arsenal, piled on the misery for rock-bottom Saints after Kevin Schade had fired the Bees ahead. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Southampton 0-5 Brentford: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Bryan Mbeumo sinks Saints
arts.sum: Brentford breeze past Southampton with a comfortable 5-0 win on Saturday afternoon to secure their first away victory of the 2024-25 Premier League season.

arts.ttl: Brentford earn first away win of season vs So'ton
arts.sum: Brentford thrashed relegation favourites Southampton 5-0 on Saturday to chalk up a long-overdue first away win of the Premier League season, helped by a double from Bryan Mbeumo.

arts.ttl: Brentford STORM to first away league win at Southampton
arts.sum: Highlights of the Premier League clash between Southampton and Brentford.

arts.ttl: Southampton 0-5 Brentford: Five-star Bees romp to first Premier League away win of the season

arts.ttl: Bryan Mbeumo stars as Brentford end away curse with thumping win
